description:
Koding - The Cloud Development Environment.

Koding is a platform where you can code online with PHP/Ruby/Perl with Mozilla Bespin, on your own servers or from your FTP/S3 drives. 

You can create databases, serve your websites, have your SVN and bugtracking tools -the minute you create your account. Very soon you will also be able to find your team members like in Odesk, collaborate with them instantly without exchanging any passwords.
name: KodingKoding - The Cloud Development Environment.
